main event: A round, dark object was observed traveling at a high rate of speed in St. Ignace, Michigan on January 5, 1955.
interesting points: The object was approximately 20-25 feet in diameter,The object traveled in a downward trajectory,It was observed over the city for several minutes before disappearing,Several witnesses reported seeing the object, Local and State Police investigated but found no traces of landing.
sighted object: a round, dark object in the sky
witness description: several people who reported the sighting to the police
